page.title: 11VICAR OF LITTLETON
page.content: We went to interview the vicar of Littleton on the fourth of June.He is called the{Reverend R. Le B. {Johnson.}He is not married and has no children. He lives with his mother. The vicar gave us information about the church and himself.He told us that the church was Saxon.Then the Normans destroyed it in 1066 but they rebuilt it about ten years after.There is a house next to the church called The Monks Rest.It had been there for about five hundred years.A rector had never lived there but the vicar thought that one had,because there was a lot of glebe land which surrounds the Rectory which belonged to previous vicars.
